reviewText:
Early Access Review

The first review I wrote for this game was negitive but then Roses and Gems got updated. Now the game saves perfectly fine and the world hasn't fallen yet. On top of that the update added a lot to make the game even better.

I can definite say at this point that I recommend Roses and Gems.
